sentences.sContent: Considering vertical and horizontal bending moment and tortile moment action together, equivalent bending moment is proposed in this paper to evaluate anti-bend capability of wall.
sentences.sContent_eng: Considering vertical and horizontal bending moment and tortile moment action together, equivalent bending moment is proposed in this paper to evaluate anti-bend capability of wall.
sentences.sCn: 基于墙体受到纵向弯矩、横向弯矩和扭矩的综合作用，提出采用等效弯矩法评价墙体的综合抗弯性能；
